desc: We are all about amazing plants, easy to follow advise whilst being affordable. We are based in Mentone, Australia and our home is behind the peach roller door in the Zudis store. We have the most wonderful plants, pots and accessories.

layout.text:
WE HAVE MOVED - JOIN OUR MAILING LIST TO STAY IN THE LOOP
WE ARE NOW JUST A FEW DOORS DOWN THE ROAD FROM OUR PREVIOUS HOME BEHIND THE PEACH ROLLER DOOR
40 Balcombe Rd, Mentone
